English title: I Catch a Terrible Cat
Director: Rikiya Imaizumi

Year: 2012
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2119455/

Takada, a successful novelist whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s about to turn 60, has struggled with writerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s block since the death of his wife. When the beautiful new waitress at his favourite bar shows unusual interest in him, Takada starts to believe he might be able to conquer his loneliness. Meanwhile, he becomes involved against his will in the romantic entanglements of his daughter, his son, and a young male admirer. An intricate, absorbing and ingenious romantic comedy.
